rukus.text: 21|51|Va ʙe tardid, peş az on Mo ʙa Iʙrohim [ruşdi fikrī va] hidojataşro ato kardem va ʙa [şoistagihoi] ū dono ʙudem
21|52|On goh ki ʙa padari xud va qavmaş guft: “In muçassamaho cist, ki ʙa parastişi onho istodaed?”
21|53|Onon guftand: “Mo padaronamonro didem, ki onhoro meparastidand”
21|54|[Iʙrohim] Guft: “Hatman, şumo va padaronaton dar gumrohii oşkor ʙudaed”
21|55|Onon guftand: “Ojo [suxani] haq ʙarojamon ovardaī jo şuxī mekunī?”
21|56|Ū guft: “Balki [suxanam haq ast] Parvardigoraton parvardigori osmonho va zamin ast, hamon ki onhoro padid ovardaast va man ʙar in [suxan] guvoham”
21|57|Va [ʙo xud guft] “Ba Alloh taolo savgand, pas az on ki puşt karded va [ʙa çaşn] rafted, ʙaroi [noʙudii] ʙuthojaton tadʙire meandeşam”
21|58|Pas [dar ƣijoʙi ʙutparaston] hamai onhoro ʙa çuz [ʙuti] ʙuzurgaşon ʙişkast, şojad, ʙa suroƣi on ʙiravand [to haqoiqro ʙarojaşon ʙozgū kunad]
21|59|[Vaqte onon ʙutxonaro cunin didand] Guftand: “Ci kase ʙo ma'ʙudoni mo cunin kardaast? Hatman, ū sitamgor ast”
21|60|[Barxe] Guftand: “Mo şunidem çavone, ki ūro Iʙrohim megūjand, az onho [ʙa ʙadī] jod mekunad”
21|61|Guftand: “Pas ūro dar ʙaroʙari didagoni mardum ʙijovared, ʙoşad, ki [ʙar e'tirofaş ʙa gunoh] guvoh ʙoşand”
21|62|[Vaqte Iʙrohimro ovardand] Guftand: “Ej Iʙrohim, ojo tu in [kor] -ro ʙo ma'ʙudoni mo kardaī?”
21|63|Ū guft: “Balki [ʙuti] ʙuzurgaşon cunin kardaast. Agar suxan megūjand, az onho ʙipursed»
21|64|On goh [onon] ʙa xud omadand va [ʙa jakdigar] guftand: “Voqean, şumo [muşriku] sitamgored”
21|65|Sipas [ʙoz ham] sar ʙa duşmanī va inkor ʙardoştand [va guftand] “Tu xuʙ medonī, ki inho suxan namegūjand”
21|66|[Iʙrohim] guft: “Ojo ʙa çoji Alloh taolo cizhoero meparasted, ki na sude ʙarojaton dorad va na zijone ʙa şumo merasonad
21|67|Voj ʙar şumo va ʙar on ci ʙa çoji Alloh taolo meparasted! Ojo nameandeşed?”
21|68|Onon guftand: “Agar mexohed [ʙaroi muçozotaş] kore kuned, ūro ʙisūzoned va ma'ʙudonatonro jorī dihed”
21|69|[Sarançom ūro dar otaş andoxtand, vale Mo] Guftem: “Ej otaş, ʙar Iʙrohim sard va salomat ʙoş”
21|70|Va xostand ʙaroi [noʙudii ū najrange ʙa kor ʙarand, vale Mo ononro zijonkortarin [mardum] soxtem
21|71|Va ū va Lutro [ʙo hiçrat] ʙa sarzamine, ki ʙaroi çahonijon dar on ʙarakat nihodaem [Şom], naçot dodem
21|72|Va Ishoq va [navaaş] Ja'quʙro [niz ʙa unvoni ʙaxşiş] afzunī ʙa ū ʙaxşidem va hamagiaşonro [afrode] şoista gardonidem

21|73|Va ononro peşvojone qaror dodem, ki ʙa farmoni Mo [mardumro] hidojat mekardand va ançomi korhoi nek va ʙarpo doştani namoz va adoi zakotro ʙa eşon vahj kardem va onon [hama] parastişgari Mo ʙudand
21|74|Mo ʙa Lut [içozati] qazovat va ilm [-i din] dodem va ūro az şahre, ki [sokinonaş] a'moli zişt [-u palid] ançom medodand, naçot ʙaxşidem. Ba rostī, ki onon gurūhe palid va nofarmon ʙudand
21|75|Va ūro dar rahmati xud vorid kardem. Be gumon, ū az şoistagon ʙud
